text: abaethukm 'ayuha alnas- baed almawt 'ashadu fi tqdyrkm 'am khalaq alsma'? rafaeaha fawqakum kalbna', waela sqfha fi alhawa' la tafawut fiha wala ftwr, wazlm laylaha bghrwb shmsha, wa'abraz nharha bshrwqha. wal'ard baed khalaq alsama' bstha, wawde fiha mnafeha, wfjjar fiha euyun alma', wanbt fiha ma yurea min alnbatat, wathbt fiha aljibal awtadana lha. khalaq subhanah kl hadhih alnaeam manfaeat lakum wlaneamkm. ('in 'iieadat khalaqakum yawm alqiamat 'ahwan ealaa allah min khalq hadhih alashya', wklh ealaa allah hayin ysyr)
